DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : It unclear whether exercise training without Continuous Positive Airway Pressure ( CPAP ) Oral Appliance ( OA ) effective reduce symptom Obstructive Sleep Apnea ( OSA ) treatment solely CPAP OA . Objective : In patient moderate OSA , investigator evaluate effect subjective objective measure sleep , quality life mood different form treatment : exercise train 4 month ; exercise training 4 month associate CPAP OA ; treatment CPAP treatment OA . Material Methods : Sixty male patient ( 25-65 year , sedentary lifestyle , Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 35kg/m2 , Apnea-Hypopnea Index ( AHI ) 15-30/h , Epworth sleepiness scale > 9 ) divide three group : CPAP+exercise group ( CE ; n=20 ) , OA+exercise group ( AE ; n=20 ) , Exercise training group ( E ; n=20 ) . The patient group CE AE complete two month treatment CPAP OA examine separate effect device . As patient E group use CPAP undergo four month exercise train . After initial step , patient CE AE group undergo four month exercise train associate CPAP OA . The investigator evaluate subjective sleep parameter ( sleep disorder questionnaire , Epworth Sleepiness Scale , sleep diary ) objective ( polysomnography ) , Short Form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) , Questionnaire Profile Mood States ( POMS ) anthropometric measurement ( neck circumference body composition ) , incremental exercise test ( ergospirometry ) one Repetition Maximum test ( 1RM ) .
